Name: EC2SsmAssociations
Documentation: SsmAssociations is a property of the AWS::EC2::Instance resource that specifies the Amazon EC2 Simple Systems Manager (SSM) document and parameter values to associate with an instance.

Parameters.Name: AssociationParameters
Parameters.Documentation: The input parameter values to use with the associated SSM document.

Parameters.Name: DocumentName
Parameters.Documentation: The name of an SSM document to associate with the instance.
